data.name: chain_1_fallout
data.value: Steel Hunt

data.name: chain_2_fallout
data.value: Domination

data.name: quest_1_1
data.value: LT-1: For Victory!

data.name: quest_1_10
data.value: LT-10: The Best Result

data.name: quest_1_10_advise
data.value: A good scout knows when to be cautious and when to be aggressive. Stay alert to the flow of battle.

data.name: quest_1_10_descr
data.value: The more effective you are in a battle, the more experience you will earn. Show them what a light tank is capable of!

data.name: quest_1_10_short
data.value: LT-10

data.name: quest_1_11
data.value: LT-11: A Fair Fight

data.name: quest_1_11_advise
data.value: High-tier light tanks can carry significant firepower. On the one hand, your gun may be inferior to the gun on a heavy tank, but, on the other hand, your gun will probably penetrate a heavy tank's rear armor quite nicely.

data.name: quest_1_11_descr
data.value: The higher the tier of your light tank, the more firepower you get, in addition to your speed, view range, and stealth.

data.name: quest_1_11_short
data.value: LT-11

data.name: quest_1_12
data.value: LT-12: The Ghost

data.name: quest_1_12_advise
data.value: Once the enemy spots you, you will have to stay constantly on the move. But if you have not yet been spotted, find a position in a bush where you can stay concealed while lighting up the enemy. Equip your tank for stealth beforehand.

data.name: quest_1_12_descr
data.value: Good concealment increases your chances of survival in battle. Light tanks have great concealment abilities, thanks to their relatively low silhouettes.

data.name: quest_1_12_short
data.value: LT-12

data.name: quest_1_13
data.value: LT-13: The Key to Victory

data.name: quest_1_13_advise
data.value: If you join a battle as part of a Platoon, make sure that you have solid voice communication among your Platoon members. This will help to save the time you usually spend typing messages in Chat.

data.name: quest_1_13_descr
data.value: Victory is easier to achieve when you are part of a Platoon, and even more so when your tactical unit is well coordinated. While you are distracting the enemy and relaying their position, your Platoon members will cause damage to targets spotted by you, bringing your team one step closer to victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

data.name: quest_1_13_short
data.value: LT-13

data.name: quest_1_14
data.value: LT-14: The Battle Watch

data.name: quest_1_14_advise
data.value: The more experienced players fighting alongside you in battle, the higher the combat efficiency of your team. Greatly increase the team's effectiveness by entering a battle in a Platoon. Alternatively, you can play alone if your are confident that you have high enough skill and that your allies will not let you down.

data.name: quest_1_14_descr
data.value: A light tank in a coordinated Platoon can spell disaster for the enemy team. Platoon with vehicles that complement your playstyle: you might want to go into battle platooned with SPGs, or you may prefer a fast-moving pack of light tanks. Do not be afraid to experiment with different lineups. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

data.name: quest_1_14_short
data.value: LT-14

data.name: quest_1_15
data.value: LT-15: The Aggressive Recon Specialist

data.name: quest_1_15_advise
data.value: You are not a bull in a china shop. There is no need to break through right away. Be patient, choose your moment, and appear where the enemy is not expecting you. Your advantages are your speed, maneuverability, and view range—use them wisely. Do not forget that your vehicle also has a gun.

data.name: quest_1_15_descr
data.value: It's time to show the enemy what a real light tank can do!

data.name: quest_1_15_short
data.value: LT-15

data.name: quest_1_3_advise
data.value: Always try to flank the enemy and hit them from the rear, where the armor is weakest. Do not linger in one spot. If you change positions frequently, the enemy will have a hard time hitting your vehicle. Remember that light tanks have the same chance of being detected while on the move as when they are stationary.

data.name: quest_1_3_descr
data.value: Your light tank has enough speed to quickly cross the map and provide support to your allies where your help is needed.

data.name: quest_1_4_advise
data.value: To destroy a track effectively, target the drive wheel at the front or rear of the suspension. Remember that even if your gun is incapable of penetrating the armor of an enemy vehicle, it can always destroy the track. HE shells are best suited for this purpose. You will receive more experience if your allies cause damage to enemy vehicles immobilized by you.

data.name: quest_1_4_descr
data.value: Destroy a track of an enemy vehicle, thus immobilizing it and exposing it to the fire of your teammates’ more powerful guns. When you destroy a track of an enemy vehicle you temporarily immobilize it. This will help you and your allies to take better aim.

data.name: quest_1_5_9_condition_main
data.value: • Destroy any modules of enemy vehicles or injure members of their crew, totaling at least 3 modules and crew members. • The number of destroyed modules and injured crew members is totaled across all enemy vehicles you have damaged in the battle.

data.name: quest_1_5_advise
data.value: Once you have spotted an enemy, keep it under observation long enough for your teammates to take aim and fire. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the spotted vehicle by selecting "Requesting fire at…" from the Command Menu.

data.name: quest_1_5_descr
data.value: At the higher tiers, light tanks are very vulnerable to enemy fire. Do what light tanks are made to do: spot enemy vehicles.

data.name: quest_1_5_short
data.value: LT-5

data.name: quest_1_6
data.value: LT-6: Battle Support

data.name: quest_1_6_advise
data.value: The longer your view range, the better. Try to spot enemy vehicles and hit their tracks while keeping yourself alive. Equipment such as Coated Optics and Binocular Telescope can help you to spot the enemy from a safe distance.

data.name: quest_1_6_descr
data.value: Damage caused with your assistance is one of the most important statistics for light tanks. If this statistic is high, that means you were an asset to your team in battle.

data.name: quest_1_6_short
data.value: LT-6

data.name: quest_1_7
data.value: LT-7: The SPG Hunter

data.name: quest_1_7_advise
data.value: Taking out enemy artillery is not easy. Wait until your teammates have gotten the enemy's attention, and then rush to the enemy SPGs. When you engage them, try not to cross in front of their guns. Instead, hit them from the sides and rear.

data.name: quest_1_7_descr
data.value: Artillery is a priority target for light tanks. Destroying enemy SPGs will greatly increase your team's chance of victory.

data.name: quest_1_7_short
data.value: LT-7

data.name: quest_1_8
data.value: LT-8: Get Out of Our Base!

data.name: quest_1_8_advise
data.value: If you are not 100% positive that your shells will penetrate the invader’s armor, load a High-Explosive shell instead. HE shells have a greater probability of causing damage to the enemy vehicle. Remember, all it takes is 1 HP of damage to the enemy vehicle or a damaged module to reset the capture points of your base. When you are attempting to capture a base, try to avoid enemy fire as much as possible.

data.name: quest_1_8_descr
data.value: In the heat of battle, it is easy to forget about the defense of your own or the neutral base. Such imprudence may allow the enemy to gain the upper hand and seize the objective rapidly. Remember, your tank has enough speed to break contact and retreat to defend the base and fend off the invaders with precise shots or a daring ramming attack, thus saving your team from an imminent defeat.

data.name: quest_1_8_short
data.value: LT-8

data.name: quest_1_9
data.value: LT-9: Hawk-Eyed

data.name: quest_1_9_advise
data.value: Upgrading your turret may improve your view range. This will help you to spot enemy vehicles long before they get close.

data.name: quest_1_9_descr
data.value: Light tanks are the eyes of their team. They help to spot enemy vehicles and keep them visible during the battle.

data.name: quest_1_9_short
data.value: LT-9

data.name: quest_2_1
data.value: HT-1: Debut

data.name: quest_2_10
data.value: HT-10: A Weighty Argument

data.name: quest_2_10_advise
data.value: The heat of battle is exactly the time when your tank can show all it is worth. Your great armor protection, if used efficiently, will ensure survival even in an almost hopeless situation. The longer your tank survives in a battle, the more damage you can cause to the enemy.

data.name: quest_2_10_descr
data.value: Keep your gun active and keep yourself alive as long as possible.

data.name: quest_2_10_short
data.value: HT-10

data.name: quest_2_11
data.value: HT-11: Not Even a Scratch!

data.name: quest_2_11_advise
data.value: Use a First Aid Kit or a Repair Kit if the enemy destroys a key module of your vehicle or injures a crew member.

data.name: quest_2_11_descr
data.value: Every module destroyed and crew member injured can become a problem. Try to keep them as safe as possible when breaking through the enemy ranks.

data.name: quest_2_11_short
data.value: HT-11

data.name: quest_2_12
data.value: HT-12: Sturdy Armor

data.name: quest_2_12_advise
data.value: As much as possible, present your front armor to the enemy and hide your flanks and weak spots. Angle your armor to increase its effectiveness.

data.name: quest_2_12_descr
data.value: Your armor can block a great amount of damage if you use it well.

data.name: quest_2_12_short
data.value: HT-12

data.name: quest_2_13
data.value: HT-13: Storm the Defense!

data.name: quest_2_13_advise
data.value: When playing as part of a Platoon, protect each other’s flanks and focus your fire on the enemy. Keep each other alive, tear into the enemy, and find a way to win the battle.

data.name: quest_2_13_descr
data.value: A Platoon of well-coordinated heavy tanks can turn the tide of the most desperate battle. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

data.name: quest_2_13_short
data.value: HT-13

data.name: quest_2_14
data.value: HT-14: Take that Hill!

data.name: quest_2_14_advise
data.value: Coordinate with your teammates and cover as much of the battlefield as possible with destructive fire.

data.name: quest_2_14_descr
data.value: Destroy all types of enemy vehicles, stop them cold, and leave them with no hope of victory. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is much more difficult.

data.name: quest_2_14_short
data.value: HT-14

data.name: quest_2_15
data.value: HT-15: Tempered Steel

data.name: quest_2_15_advise
data.value: Act carefully. Survive! Try to protect your side and rear armor from enemy fire. Heavy tanks can carry almost every battle, that is why they are always high-value targets for enemy SPGs. Keep a cool head and do not let them pin you down.

data.name: quest_2_15_descr
data.value: A heavy tank can hit hard, but it can also take a hit and keep battling. Engage the enemy and keep the pressure on.

data.name: quest_2_15_short
data.value: HT-15

data.name: quest_2_5_advise
data.value: Constantly evaluate the situation on the battlefield. Often it is better to retreat from a disadvantageous situation, so you can cause more damage later.

data.name: quest_2_5_descr
data.value: Leave your enemy no chances by hitting them at the first opportunity. Every successful hit brings your team one step closer to victory.

data.name: quest_2_5_short
data.value: HT-5

data.name: quest_2_6
data.value: HT-6: A Two-Course Meal

data.name: quest_2_6_advise
data.value: As for medium tanks, you should be wary of their speed and maneuverability, as they usually avoid direct combat. Always monitor the minimap to quickly react to a medium tank's unexpected arrival.

data.name: quest_2_6_descr
data.value: Most heavy tanks have extremely thick armor on the front. If you cannot flank them, try hitting the spots where the frontal armor is the thinnest. Weak spots usually include hatches, observation devices, the commander's cupola, and the lower glacis plate.

data.name: quest_2_6_short
data.value: HT-6

data.name: quest_2_7
data.value: HT-7: I've Got It Covered

data.name: quest_2_7_advise
data.value: Be careful when approaching the enemy base—get ready for a "warm" reception. If you prefer defensive tactics, make use of the terrain to find the best concealment and vantage points, which you can use to defend your own base (or the neutral base in an Encounter Battle) against the approaching enemy.

data.name: quest_2_7_descr
data.value: Heavy tanks are great for breakthrough tactics. Punch through the enemy defensive lines and capture their base. However, do not underestimate your enemy—they might employ the same strategy.

data.name: quest_2_7_short
data.value: HT-7

data.name: quest_2_8
data.value: HT-8: With Guns Blazing

data.name: quest_2_8_advise
data.value: As a heavy tank, you are the backbone of your team. Enemy heavy tanks are just as important. Take them on and try to destroy them first, or at least keep them busy for as long as possible.

data.name: quest_2_8_descr
data.value: Remember, your armor is your key strength. Cause as much damage as possible while your opponents enjoy the non-penetration messages over and over again.

data.name: quest_2_8_short
data.value: HT-8

data.name: quest_2_9
data.value: HT-9: A Crushing Blow

data.name: quest_2_9_advise
data.value: The driver's Controlled Impact skill and the Spall Liner equipment can significantly reduce the damage done to your vehicle by ramming, and, at the same time, increase the damage of your own ramming attacks.

data.name: quest_2_9_descr
data.value: Close-quarters engagements often render you unable to reload in time. In this situation, finish an enemy off by ramming them! The weaker the enemy vehicle's armor at the point of impact, the more damage you will cause.

data.name: quest_2_9_short
data.value: HT-9

data.name: quest_3_1
data.value: MT-1: First Steps

data.name: quest_3_10
data.value: MT-10: A Versatile Warrior

data.name: quest_3_10_advise
data.value: Your vehicle is maneuverable. Try exploiting this advantage to outflank enemy vehicles and attack them from the rear or sides. Vehicles that have weak armor can be destroyed by ramming attacks.

data.name: quest_3_10_descr
data.value: A medium tank can perform well on any type of map and against any type of enemy vehicle. Study the features of your own vehicles to understand how to emerge victorious in any situation.

data.name: quest_3_10_short
data.value: MT-10

data.name: quest_3_11
data.value: MT-11: Ram Them!

data.name: quest_3_11_advise
data.value: The higher the speed and the greater your vehicle's weight, the more damage you will cause by ramming an enemy vehicle.

data.name: quest_3_11_descr
data.value: Some situations call for unconventional tactics.

data.name: quest_3_11_short
data.value: MT-11

data.name: quest_3_12
data.value: MT-12: The Incinerator

data.name: quest_3_12_advise
data.value: Penetrating hits that strike the engine or fuel tanks have a chance of causing a fire. Study diagrams of vehicles to learn where these crucial modules are located.

data.name: quest_3_12_descr
data.value: Setting an enemy vehicle on fire is one of the most efficient ways to destroy it.

data.name: quest_3_12_short
data.value: MT-12

data.name: quest_3_13
data.value: MT-13: Aggressive Actions

data.name: quest_3_13_advise
data.value: As soon as you destroy an enemy, move on to the next target. Your teammates most likely need your help somewhere else.

data.name: quest_3_13_descr
data.value: A Platoon of medium tanks can be of great help to the team across the entire battlefield. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

data.name: quest_3_13_short
data.value: MT-13

data.name: quest_3_14
data.value: MT-14: Team Play

data.name: quest_3_14_advise
data.value: Select one target at a time and focus your fire to rapidly crack the toughest defense. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the spotted vehicle by selecting “Requesting fire at…” from the Command Menu.

data.name: quest_3_14_descr
data.value: In a battle, you must rely on your own skill as well as on your Platoon members and allies. If all members of your team fight as one, victory is guaranteed! This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

data.name: quest_3_14_short
data.value: MT-14

data.name: quest_3_15
data.value: MT-15: Hunt Down the Hunter

data.name: quest_3_15_advise
data.value: Think where you would position your tank destroyer if you drove one. This may be the spot where an enemy tank destroyer is hiding right now. TDs are often set up to cover the most common lanes of attack, so try hitting them from an unexpected direction.

data.name: quest_3_15_descr
data.value: You can turn the tide of the battle by taking out enemy tank destroyers.

data.name: quest_3_15_short
data.value: MT-15

data.name: quest_3_2_advise
data.value: The penetration chance marker on your reticle shows the chance of penetrating the enemy vehicle at a particular point. A red marker indicates no chance of penetration, a yellow marker indicates a low chance of penetration, a green marker indicates a high chance of penetration. Try to aim at the sides or the rear of enemy vehicles. Look for their weak spots.

data.name: quest_3_2_descr
data.value: Every successful shot brings your team one step closer to victory. However, it is not always easy to land a solid hit on an enemy vehicle.

data.value: • Destroy any modules of enemy vehicles or injure members of their crew, totaling at least 8 modules and crew members. • The number of destroyed modules and injured crew members is totaled across all enemy vehicles you have damaged in the battle.

data.name: quest_3_5_advise
data.value: Do not let enemy light tanks achieve their main objective! Prevent them from spotting and immobilizing the vehicles of your teammates.

data.name: quest_3_5_descr
data.value: One of the objectives of medium tanks is to destroy light tanks.

data.name: quest_3_5_short
data.value: MT-5

data.name: quest_3_6
data.value: MT-6: Rapid Fire

data.name: quest_3_6_advise
data.value: Your tank combines mobility and firepower: use them both. You can help your teammates on one flank, then retreat to the base to protect the SPGs, and then suddenly strike the enemy from the rear—all in one battle.

data.name: quest_3_6_descr
data.value: Medium tanks are flexible and able to achieve a variety of objectives on the battlefield.

data.name: quest_3_6_short
data.value: MT-6

data.name: quest_3_7
data.value: MT-7: A Surprise Blow

data.name: quest_3_7_advise
data.value: Enemy artillery can cause heavy damage to your teammates. Break through a flank, rush to the enemy base, and neutralize their SPGs.

data.name: quest_3_7_descr
data.value: Enemy SPGs are high-priority targets for you. Neutralize them to get your team one step closer to victory.

data.name: quest_3_7_short
data.value: MT-7

data.name: quest_3_8
data.value: MT-8: Confrontation

data.name: quest_3_8_advise
data.value: Focus on the vehicles of your tier or higher. A fight against strong opponents will help you sharpen your skill with medium tanks, as well as receive more valuable rewards after battles.

data.name: quest_3_8_descr
data.value: Destroy same-tier enemy vehicles or vehicles of a higher tier to significantly contribute to the victory of your team.

data.name: quest_3_8_short
data.value: MT-8

data.name: quest_3_9
data.value: MT-9: A Worthy Opponent

data.name: quest_3_9_advise
data.value: Outflank enemy vehicles, shoot them while concealed, target their weak spots to pick them apart—whatever it takes. Remember that heavy tanks are slower than you, and their turrets have low traverse speeds.

data.name: quest_3_9_descr
data.value: Seeking and destroying enemy heavy tanks is a hard task to accomplish but very beneficial to the team's cause.

data.name: quest_3_9_short
data.value: MT-9

data.name: quest_4_1
data.value: TD-1: Effective Performance

data.name: quest_4_10
data.value: TD-10: A Hidden Menace

data.name: quest_4_10_advise
data.value: Use camouflage and Camouflage Net. Keep your distance and let your teammates do the spotting. You serve your team by staying out of sight, but be in a position to fire when the opportunity arises.

data.name: quest_4_10_descr
data.value: If your tank destroyer is well-concealed, you can strike the unsuspecting enemy without them being able to respond.

data.name: quest_4_10_short
data.value: TD-10

data.name: quest_4_11
data.value: TD-11: The Key Role

data.name: quest_4_11_advise
data.value: A major challenge for tank destroyers is surviving the battle long enough to achieve their full damage-dealing potential. You must engage, but you must also stay alive.

data.name: quest_4_11_descr
data.value: Your powerful gun is a force to be reckoned with. If, of course, you know how to shoot it.

data.name: quest_4_11_short
data.value: TD-11

data.name: quest_4_12
data.value: TD-12: Big Game Hunting

data.name: quest_4_12_advise
data.value: You have the potential to carry your team to victory. If you know the weak spots of enemy heavy tanks, the thickness of their armor cannot save them.

data.name: quest_4_12_descr
data.value: Armed with your wits and an excellent gun, you can destroy enemy vehicles before they get close. Once an enemy heavy tank has been spotted, you can cause a lot of damage to them before they even spot you.

data.name: quest_4_12_short
data.value: TD-12

data.name: quest_4_13
data.value: TD-13: Tank Hunters

data.name: quest_4_13_advise
data.value: Most tank destroyers have excellent single-shot damage. Coordinate with Platoon mates and fire in volleys. Not many enemy vehicles can stand up to multiple, simultaneous hits.

data.name: quest_4_13_descr
data.value: As a Platoon, you can focus your fire and rapidly take down enemy tanks. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own; however, the latter is more difficult.

data.name: quest_4_13_short
data.value: TD-13

data.name: quest_4_14
data.value: TD-14: Big Hunt

data.name: quest_4_14_advise
data.value: Provide covering fire for members of your Platoon who have taken a beating. Sometimes it is better to draw enemy fire yourself in order to give an ally a chance to retreat to safety.

data.name: quest_4_14_descr
data.value: A well-coordinated Platoon of tank destroyers will not allow the enemy to outflank their team's positions. This mission may be completed either as part of a Platoon or on your own, however, the latter is more difficult.

data.name: quest_4_14_short
data.value: TD-14

data.name: quest_4_15
data.value: TD-15: Triumph

data.name: quest_4_15_advise
data.value: The more damage you cause in a battle, the better the chance of victory for your team. It is a simple rule that you should remember.

data.name: quest_4_15_descr
data.value: When diplomacy fails, the guns start to speak. So get your loaded word in.

data.name: quest_4_15_short
data.value: TD-15

data.name: quest_4_1_10_condition_add
data.value: • Win the battle.

data.name: quest_4_1_10_condition_description_top_xp

data.name: quest_4_5_advise
data.value: Wait until you are fully aimed before firing. A hasty shot is often a wasted shot.

data.name: quest_4_5_descr
data.value: When you drive a tank destroyer, it is important to know how to effectively shoot at long range.

data.name: quest_4_5_short
data.value: TD-5

data.name: quest_4_6
data.value: TD-6: They Shall Not Pass!

data.name: quest_4_6_advise
data.value: Make sure that your vehicle is hidden behind bushes or fallen trees before firing. If your vehicle is 15 m behind a bush or fallen tree, you have a better chance of remaining concealed after firing.

data.name: quest_4_6_descr
data.value: Try to keep enemy vehicles as far from your position as possible. Destroy them while they are approaching, as it will be much harder to blunt the attack in close combat.

data.name: quest_4_6_short
data.value: TD-6

data.name: quest_4_7
data.value: TD-7: The First Strike

data.name: quest_4_7_advise
data.value: If an enemy vehicle is charging at you and you cannot penetrate its frontal armor, you may be able to destroy its track and get away. Study the parameters of your own vehicle. Some tank destroyers have strong frontal armor that can deflect considerable hits.

data.name: quest_4_7_descr
data.value: Do not let the enemy get too close to you: most TDs are thinly armored.

data.name: quest_4_7_short
data.value: TD-7

data.name: quest_4_8
data.value: TD-8: A Huge Caliber

data.name: quest_4_8_advise
data.value: Look for every chance to damage enemy vehicles, but at the same time, also try to survive.

data.name: quest_4_8_descr
data.value: As a tank destroyer driver, you will be expected to cause more damage to enemies than the amount of HP of your own vehicle.

data.name: quest_4_8_short
data.value: TD-8

data.name: quest_4_9
data.value: TD-9: Spot On!

data.name: quest_4_9_advise
data.value: Aim at the weak spots of an enemy vehicle, such as the sides, rear, and lower glacis plate. It is also helpful to know the location of key components such as ammunition racks and fuel tanks. To play most effectively, you may wish to take a few Premium shells into the battle. These shells can penetrate much thicker armor than standard ones.

data.name: quest_4_9_descr
data.value: The great characteristics of your gun compensate for the relatively weak armor protection of your vehicle.

data.name: quest_4_9_short
data.value: TD-9

data.name: quest_5_1
data.value: SPG-1: A Bold Claim

data.name: quest_5_10
data.value: SPG-10: All Included

data.name: quest_5_10_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_10_descr
data.value: The battle situation can change rapidly—always keep an eye on the minimap and make sure you have a clear view of enemy vehicles. You will have to move across the map all the time instead of staying in one position. Your allies rely on your SPG firepower, so do your best in the right time and place.

data.name: quest_5_10_short
data.value: SPG-10

data.name: quest_5_11
data.value: SPG-11: The Area of Effect

data.name: quest_5_11_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_11_descr
data.value: In addition to the considerable amount of damage caused by a well-placed shot, a High-Explosive shell can also stun all misplaced vehicles within the burst radius after the shell explosion. Many maps feature spots where enemy vehicles bunch together. Take your chance and send your highly "explosive" regards to them.

data.name: quest_5_11_short
data.value: SPG-11

data.name: quest_5_12
data.value: SPG-12: The Evil Eye

data.name: quest_5_12_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_12_descr
data.value: Your allies destroyed the stunned enemy vehicle? Good news for you, since it is your contribution that brings the desired victory one step closer! Your objective is to provide fire support and assist your allies in the right place at the right time.

data.name: quest_5_12_short
data.value: SPG-12

data.name: quest_5_13
data.value: SPG-13: C for Cooperation

data.name: quest_5_13_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_13_descr
data.value: Strong cooperation between SPGs and allies should make the enemy team extremely worried. Coordinate your actions and focus your fire on one enemy target at a time.

data.name: quest_5_13_short
data.value: SPG-13

data.name: quest_5_14
data.value: SPG-14: One of Us!

data.name: quest_5_14_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_14_descr
data.value: Cooperation is the key to victory for the whole team. Highlight the enemy vehicle you are aiming at for your allies to immediately bring down fire on it once it has been stunned or immobilized. Remember: a lone soldier can hardly make a battle.

data.name: quest_5_14_short
data.value: SPG-14

data.name: quest_5_15
data.value: SPG-15: War Gods

data.name: quest_5_15_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_15_descr
data.value: An SPG that survives for as long as possible is a real asset for the team. Keep firing one shell after another while trying not to get caught under enemy fire. Take your time and think twice before "pulling the trigger", since "one shot—one hit" is the best strategy for a vehicle with a long reload time.

data.name: quest_5_15_short
data.value: SPG-15

data.name: quest_5_1_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_1_descr
data.value: The large burst radius after a shell explosion is the key feature of SPG vehicles. Even if you failed to deliver a direct hit to the target enemy vehicle, there is still a chance to cause serious trouble by stunning it. The enemy vehicle is marked with the stun indicator, which is visible to your allies. If allies cause damage to the vehicles stunned by you, you will receive additional credits and experience for damage caused with your assistance.

data.value: SPG-1

data.name: quest_5_2_8_condition_add
data.value: • Deliver at least 1 flag.

data.name: quest_5_2_8_condition_main
data.value: • Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles with Combat Reserves. • Earn at least 150 victory points.

data.name: quest_5_2_9_condition_add
data.value: • Do not lose more than 2 of your vehicles in the battle.

data.name: quest_5_2_9_condition_main
data.value: • Damage caused and damage blocked by armor must total at least 10,000 HP. •Damage caused with or received from Combat Reserves is not counted. • Results achieved in all vehicles that you selected for the battle are added together.

data.name: quest_5_2_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_2_descr
data.value: An enemy vehicle remains stunned for a particular period of time and cannot do their best on the battlefield. Remember: a stunned vehicle becomes an easy target.

data.name: quest_5_2_short
data.value: SPG-2

data.name: quest_5_3
data.value: SPG-3: Slow and Steady Gets Stunned

data.name: quest_5_3_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_3_descr
data.value: Concealed and powerful enemy tank destroyers and well-armored heavy tanks can easily turn the tide of the battle. They are the first-priority targets, and causing damage to them (or assisting in their destruction) should be the primary objective for a player in an SPG. The majority of heavies and tank destroyers are slow and hulking, which increases the chances for a successful shot.

data.name: quest_5_3_short
data.value: SPG-3

data.name: quest_5_4
data.value: SPG-4: I'll See You Through

data.name: quest_5_4_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_4_descr
data.value: Learn the major routes of the enemy heavy tanks and positions where the cunning tank destroyers usually hide. Aiming at a particular map area in advance increases the chances for effective and devastating fire at enemy positions. These types of vehicles usually follow rather predictable tactics on certain maps. Be smart: analyze the setup of the enemy team and select the most suitable position from the very start of the battle.

data.name: quest_5_4_short
data.value: SPG-4

data.name: quest_5_5
data.value: SPG-5: Sharing is Caring

data.name: quest_5_5_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_5_descr
data.value: Stunning enemy vehicles not only brings your team one step closer to victory, but also ensures you receive additional experience and credits if your allies cause damage to enemy vehicles stunned by you. Do not forget to mark the area you are aiming at (the T key by default) to notify and draw the attention of your allies.

data.name: quest_5_5_short
data.value: SPG-5

data.name: quest_5_6
data.value: SPG-6: Hammer of the Gods

data.name: quest_5_6_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_6_descr
data.value: The primary objective of SPGs is to provide fire support to allied vehicles. Stunned enemy vehicles are poor fighters, so your teammates will certainly appreciate your assistance. However, be cautious when firing: a careless shot can also stun an allied vehicle. Friendly fire will not be tolerated!

data.name: quest_5_6_short
data.value: SPG-6

data.name: quest_5_7
data.value: SPG-7: Careful Consideration

data.name: quest_5_7_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_7_descr
data.value: To complete this mission, use a selective approach to choosing your targets. Do not concentrate fire on one enemy vehicle, even if it is an easy target. The best strategy is to hit big groups of enemy vehicles with one shot. Study the maps and learn the basic routes of vehicles.

data.name: quest_5_7_short
data.value: SPG-7

data.name: quest_5_8
data.value: SPG-8: I Did My Best

data.name: quest_5_8_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_8_descr
data.value: You receive experience for all effective actions. Try to be the MVP: cause damage, assist in destroying enemy vehicles, and survive the battle. Change your position after every shot; otherwise, the counter fire of enemy SPGs can destroy your vehicle.

data.name: quest_5_8_short
data.value: SPG-8

data.name: quest_5_9
data.value: SPG-9: Collateral Damage

data.name: quest_5_9_advise
data.value: ?empty?

data.name: quest_5_9_descr
data.value: Powerful HE-shells can not only reduce the hit points of enemy vehicles, but also have a high chance of destroying modules or injuring crew members with splash damage.

data.name: quest_5_9_short
data.value: SPG-9

data.name: quest_6_1
data.value: SH-1: The Colors of Superiority

data.name: quest_6_10
data.value: SH-10: All Shall Fall

data.name: quest_6_10_advise
data.value: Watch your six: fast enemies can flank you, making your vehicle easy prey. Pay extra attention when crossing exposed areas, as tank destroyers can catch you under fire of their high-caliber guns.

data.name: quest_6_10_descr
data.value: Knowing the vulnerable spots for each type of vehicle is key to a successful encounter. Remember: heavy tanks use robust armor, tank destroyers rely on concealment, while light and medium tanks have high speed and maneuverability. Each type of enemy vehicle requires particular tactics to counter them.

data.name: quest_6_11
data.value: SH-11: Return Fire Part 2

data.name: quest_6_11_advise
data.value: Look for battered enemy vehicles instead of trying to destroy vehicles with full HP.

data.name: quest_6_11_descr
data.value: Rule #1: Survive. Respond to each enemy shot, use cunning tactics, flank and outmaneuver enemy vehicles.

data.name: quest_6_12
data.value: SH-12: Under Your Skin

data.name: quest_6_12_advise
data.value: Using Premium shells allows you to damage enemies with the heaviest armor protection.

data.name: quest_6_12_descr
data.value: Even the toughest beast can be stopped by a single shot if you know where to strike. Heavy armor is of little concern to a skilled shooter.

data.name: quest_6_13
data.value: SH-13: Up Close and Personal

data.name: quest_6_13_advise
data.value: Keep on rolling! Enable Auto-Aim for easier aiming on the move (by default, right-click while aiming at the enemy).

data.name: quest_6_13_descr
data.value: Close combat tactics are quite different from ranged combat: your vehicle has limited space to maneuver, and the enemy may get a lucky hit. In addition, on some maps, the only chance to cause damage lies in getting as close to the enemy as possible.

data.name: quest_6_14
data.value: SH-14: The Heat of Battle

data.name: quest_6_14_advise
data.value: Avoid getting caught in crossfire or direct enemy fire. Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

data.name: quest_6_14_descr
data.value: You earn experience for delivering or destroying a flag, spotting, causing damage, and destroying enemy vehicles. Prove your worth and accumulate as much experience as you can.

data.name: quest_6_15
data.value: SH-15: Checkmate

data.name: quest_6_15_advise
data.value: Take your time when selecting vehicles, equipment, and consumables. Consider adding some Premium shells; make sure you enter battle with a trained crew. Roll out!

data.name: quest_6_15_descr
data.value: Your moment of glory has come! You have already explored the maps and learned what to expect from enemy vehicles: it is time to test your mettle.

data.name: quest_6_1_advise
data.value: High-speed vehicles are the most effective flag hunters. While carrying the flag, try performing unpredictable maneuvers, such as moving in zigzags and weaving, to make you a harder target to hit.

data.name: quest_6_1_descr
data.value: A delivered or destroyed flag is an important milestone on your way to victory. Take your time and explore the map to determine the safest and fastest path for delivering a flag.

data.name: quest_6_2
data.value: SH-2: Skyfall

data.name: quest_6_2_advise
data.value: Damage caused with Combat Reserves is added to your personal score. Damage or destroy enemy vehicles with artillery strikes and airstrikes to earn victory points.

data.name: quest_6_2_descr
data.value: If a battle gets too tough, use Combat Reserves. Call in artillery strikes and airstrikes wisely and remember that cooldowns take time.

data.name: quest_6_3
data.value: SH-3: Shoot the Messenger

data.name: quest_6_3_advise
data.value: You earn more points for delivering a flag than for destroying an enemy vehicle. Whenever you have a choice, intercepting the flag carrier is always more beneficial than getting involved in a firefight.

data.name: quest_6_3_descr
data.value: Every flag the enemy delivers brings them closer to victory, which certainly isn't what you want. Focus your fire—do not allow the flag carrier to reach the base.

data.name: quest_6_4
data.value: SH-4: First to Fight

data.name: quest_6_4_advise
data.value: It might be a good idea to select a vehicle with a clip first while completing this mission. A fully loaded clip has enough shells to destroy almost any enemy vehicle.

data.name: quest_6_4_descr
data.value: Try to avoid mistakes on the front line: there is not much time for tactical planning, and the enemy must be destroyed quickly and decisively.

data.name: quest_6_5
data.value: SH-5: Warpath

data.name: quest_6_5_advise
data.value: Consider choosing a vehicle with high firepower. Be cautious: time spent repairing your vehicle is time not spent dealing damage to the enemy.

data.name: quest_6_5_descr
data.value: In order to succeed, try to aim your shots carefully. Every miss, ricochet, and non-penetration will decrease your chance of taking and keeping the lead by damage caused.

data.name: quest_6_6
data.value: SH-6: Thor's Hammer

data.name: quest_6_6_advise
data.value: Try to use Combat Reserves to catch enemy vehicles at choke points to make it more difficult for them to maneuver out and evade their imminent destruction. You can also block the enemy with your own vehicle, but try to avoid being hit by your own Combat Reserves.

data.name: quest_6_6_descr
data.value: Do not underestimate Combat Reserves: when used correctly, they can cause considerable damage to enemy vehicles.

data.name: quest_6_7
data.value: SH-7: Return Fire Part 1

data.name: quest_6_7_advise
data.value: A reckless rush at the enemy will only get you destroyed faster than you can say "woops". Instead, sneak the flag out and retreat to deliver it safely to your base.

data.name: quest_6_7_descr
data.value: Conserve your hit points. Remember: a destroyed vehicle will neither deal damage nor deliver a flag to the base.

data.name: quest_6_8
data.value: SH-8: Wild Card

data.name: quest_6_8_advise
data.value: To complete this mission, be on the lookout for battered enemy vehicles that can be destroyed by a few well-placed hits. Do not forget to avoid the allied artillery strikes and airstrikes.

data.name: quest_6_8_descr
data.value: You can affect the result of any firefight by calling in an artillery strike or an airstrike at the right place and time.

data.name: quest_6_9
data.value: SH-9: Sabotage

data.name: quest_6_9_advise
data.value: The Deadeye perk increases the chance of a critical hit and can make life easier. Remember: internal vehicle modules include the turret ring, engine, fuel tanks, ammo rack, and radio.

data.name: quest_6_9_descr
data.value: You can harm enemy vehicles by causing damage or by damaging and destroying their modules. Each critical hit substantially reduces the battle performance of the enemy.

data.name: quest_7_1
data.value: D-1: Team Player

data.name: quest_7_10
data.value: D-10: Near, Far, Wherever You Are

data.name: quest_7_10_advise
data.value: For long-range combat, choose a firing position that will allow you to cover multiple areas: sooner or later the enemy will stumble into one of them. For close combat, consider using a vehicle with a magazine reloading system to quickly cause massive damage.

data.name: quest_7_10_descr
data.value: You can effectively engage the enemy at both long and short ranges. The former involves relying on weapon accuracy, the latter—on vehicle maneuverability and speed.

data.name: quest_7_11
data.value: D-11: All Is Fair...

data.name: quest_7_11_advise
data.value: A close encounter with certain enemies can be catastrophic for your vehicle. Such threats are better disposed of via an artillery strike or airstrike. Another good use of Combat Reserves is destroying slow, hulking vehicles that will not be able to leave the strike zone.

data.name: quest_7_11_descr
data.value: This time you will have to use all of your skills and knowledge to emerge victorious. Different vehicle types have different qualities that must be taken into account during combat.

data.name: quest_7_12
data.value: D-12: Force to Be Reckoned With

data.name: quest_7_12_advise
data.value: Remember: although you need to outperform both enemies and allies, cooperation on the battlefield is the key to success.

data.name: quest_7_12_descr
data.value: It is time they saw who runs the show. Cause damage, destroy enemy vehicles, and deliver flags. These actions will increase your victory points.

data.name: quest_7_13
data.value: D-13: Hunting Giants

data.name: quest_7_13_advise
data.value: Do not forget to bring a few Premium shells into battle.

data.name: quest_7_13_descr
data.value: Higher tier vehicles have better combat characteristics, which may be a problem when you try to destroy them. To succeed in battle, you need to know the weak spots of an enemy vehicle.

data.name: quest_7_14
data.value: D-14: Critical Acclaim

data.name: quest_7_14_advise
data.value: The Deadeye perk increases the chance of a critical hit and can make things a lot easier. To increase the fighting range, use Coated Optics or Binocular Telescope.

data.name: quest_7_14_descr
data.value: To complete this mission, consider using vehicles with a high rate of fire and a good view range. Make sure you know the location of internal modules and crew members. Remember: the longer you remain in battle and the more accurately you fire, the higher your chance of causing the required number of critical hits.

data.name: quest_7_15
data.value: D-15: Veni, Vidi, Vici

data.name: quest_7_15_advise
data.value: Luck is an essential part of victory, but it only benefits those who maintain control and hold back the enemy. To arms!

data.name: quest_7_15_descr
data.value: It is time to show all the skills under your belt. From selecting the right vehicle and equipment for the mission, to planning the perfect strategy for the battle.

data.name: quest_7_1_advise
data.value: Do not always rush into the very epicenter of battle. Sometimes, amid the chaotic fighting, it is more sensible to grab the flag and deliver it to your base.

data.name: quest_7_1_descr
data.value: Causing damage, destroying enemy vehicles, and delivering flags will earn you victory points. The more you contribute to the cause in battle, the faster your team wins.

data.name: quest_7_2
data.value: D-2: Accelerate & Eliminate

data.name: quest_7_2_advise
data.value: To stay concealed, try to keep your distance from the enemy. Shooting at enemy vehicles spotted by your allies will help you to remain undetected.

data.name: quest_7_2_descr
data.value: It might be a good idea to select a vehicle with a clip first while completing this mission. A fully loaded clip has enough shells to destroy almost any enemy vehicle.

data.name: quest_7_3
data.value: D-3: Set Fire to the Rain

data.name: quest_7_3_advise
data.value: Try to use Combat Reserves to catch enemy vehicles at choke points to make it more difficult for them to maneuver out and evade their imminent destruction. You can also block the enemy with your own vehicle, but try to avoid being hit by your own Combat Reserves.

data.name: quest_7_3_descr
data.value: You will have the ability to request Combat Reserves and surprise the enemy with a sudden attack from artillery or warplanes. Remember, Combat Reserves have a cooldown period after each use.

data.name: quest_7_4
data.value: D-4: Flank You Very Much

data.name: quest_7_4_advise
data.value: If you know where important modules are located in an enemy vehicle, you can hit them where it hurts the most. For example, shooting an enemy vehicle's fuel tanks can set it on fire. Once ignited, they will not last long.

data.name: quest_7_4_descr
data.value: You will encounter different types of vehicles in battle. Different vehicles call for different combat tactics. However, it is always a good idea to flank an enemy vehicle and attack it from the rear, where their armor is thinner.

data.name: quest_7_5
data.value: D-5: Sitting Duck

data.name: quest_7_5_advise
data.value: Aim for the drive wheels, the sprocketed wheels at the front or rear of the suspension. Do not forget to draw the attention of your allies to the target vehicle by selecting "Requesting fire at…" from the Command Menu.

data.name: quest_7_5_descr
data.value: Immobilizing an enemy vehicle means that it will be unable to evade fire or artillery strikes and airstrikes, making them an easy target.

data.name: quest_7_6
data.value: D-6: Just a Shot Away

data.name: quest_7_6_advise
data.value: It is not always a good idea to chase battered enemy vehicles; they might be luring you into a trap. Do not let the enemy surround you.

data.name: quest_7_6_descr
data.value: You earn victory points by causing damage to enemy vehicles. Use your combat skills effectively: aim your shots carefully and evade enemy fire.

data.name: quest_7_7
data.value: D-7: Nerves of Steel

data.name: quest_7_7_advise
data.value: To complete this mission, choose heavily armored vehicles with high durability. The more ricochets and non-penetrating hits you receive, the closer you are to reaching your objective.

data.name: quest_7_7_descr
data.value: Do not overestimate your armor protection: avoid exposing your vehicle's sides and rear to enemy fire. Try to quickly withdraw from artillery strike and airstrike zones.

data.name: quest_7_8
data.value: D-8: Thunder and Lightning

data.name: quest_7_8_advise
data.value: To complete this mission, be on the lookout for battered enemy vehicles that can be destroyed by a few well-placed hits. Do not forget to avoid allied artillery strikes and airstrikes.

data.name: quest_7_8_descr
data.value: Do not underestimate Combat Reserves: a single, perfectly timed artillery strike or airstrike can crush any enemy.

data.name: quest_7_9
data.value: D-9: Ultimate Survival

data.name: quest_7_9_advise
data.value: Try catching the enemy off guard; attack, and withdraw rapidly. Consider choosing vehicles with sturdy armor that are capable of withstanding enemy fire.

data.name: quest_7_9_descr
data.value: Thick sloped armor is a major obstacle for enemy shells. Hide your vehicle's weak spots, flank the enemy, and deliver the maximum amount of damage.

data.name: season_1
data.value: The Long-Awaited Backup

data.name: season_1_descr
data.value: Every campaign comprises several operations that contain numerous missions for all types of vehicles. You will receive a unique vehicle for completion of each operation.

data.name: season_2
data.value: Firestorm
